note:
A forest dweller, artist, and constant reader. Friend to cats Cinnamonopteryx and Hazelnutmegadon. Writes about birds, bugs, whatever I'm reading at the moment and my general wanderings.

Avatar description: A fragment from a greyscale ink illustration of a multi-tentacled elephantine squid monster peeking out of a chaotic abyss.

Header description: A closeup photograph of hanging spiderwebs bedecked with morning dewdrops. The spiderwebs are draped beneath a brown painted wrought iron fence, and in the background is blurry greenery.

Nonbinary, autistic, Jewish

fields.name: Location
fields.value: DC area, Takoma Park, MD, USA
